name: Plane Cargo Simulator 2016
description:
Did you ever wondered how would it feel to fly through endless skies flying huge cargo carriage airplanes and flying machines?
As this game is not just about Airplane simulator this is great combination of driving fast and furious racing cars which will to transported by pilot in this cargo plane game

This is awesome combination of Cargo Airplane Car Transporter 3D simulator and luxury car simulator. So you will need skills of driving cars and flying planes.

This simulator game also features from car parking game as you will drive all luxury sports car and park them properly in plane.

Hope you will like our new concept and combination of three games in one.

please leave your review and rate us so we can improve in our next version.

Your feedback is very important to us.

Take off your plane and enjoy the ride ...
